title: Olena Khodyreva
text:
Olena Khodyreva is a former <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="women%27s%20soccer">football</a> <a href="defender%20%28soccer%29">defender</a>, who played for <a href="WFC%20Zhytlobud-2%20Kharkiv">Zhytlobud-2 Kharkiv</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Women%27s%20League">Ukrainian League</a>. She previously played for <a href="Lehenda%20Chernihiv">Lehenda Chernihiv</a> and <a href="WFC%20Naftokhimik%20Kalush">Naftokhimik Kalush</a> in Ukraine and <a href="Nadezhda%20Noginsk">Nadezhda Noginsk</a> and <a href="Zvezda%202005%20Perm">Zvezda Perm</a> in the <a href="Russian%20women%27s%20football%20championship">Russian Championship</a>. She has played the <a href="UEFA%20Women%27s%20Cup">European Cup</a> with <a href="G%C3%B6mr%C3%BCk%C3%A7%C3%BC%20Baku">Gömrükçü Baku</a>, Lehenda and Zvezda.
She is a member of the <a href="Ukraine%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Ukrainian national team</a> since 2001, and took part in the <a href="UEFA%20Women%27s%20Euro%202009">2009 European Championship</a>.
